feedback: The code lacks comprehensive error handling in several critical areas, such as file loading and model initialization.
The configuration loading mechanism could be more robust with validation for required fields.
The file structure generation could be optimized to handle large directories more efficiently.
The custom model implementation could benefit from more detailed logging and retry mechanisms.
The codebase could benefit from more consistent docstring and inline documentation.
suggestions: Implement more detailed error handling and logging throughout the codebase.
Add validation for required configuration fields to prevent runtime errors.
Optimize the file structure generation to handle large directories more efficiently.
Enhance the custom model implementation with detailed logging and improved retry mechanisms.
Add comprehensive docstring and inline documentation to improve code readability and maintainability.
strengths: The codebase is well-structured and modular, making it easy to extend with new features.
The configuration loading mechanism is flexible and supports environment variable substitution.
The file loading mechanism is efficient and supports include/exclude patterns.
The model abstraction is well-designed and supports multiple providers.
The code review agent is well-implemented and produces structured output.
